articles.title: OU Drops Bedlam Battle in Big 12 Title Game - University of Oklahoma - Soonersports.com
articles.description: OKLAHOMA CITY, Okla. — No. 1 ranked and top-seed Oklahoma Softball dropped its second game of the season in the Big 12 Championship game Saturday, losing 4-3 in eight innings to two-seed and No. 7/8 Oklahoma State.
